name: NUBO
description: NUBO is the platform shaping the future of work. It's a widespread workspace network leveraging underused urban spaces accessible through a single and flexible membership and allowing you to access a community of professionals to connect with.
one_liner: NUBO is the platform shaping the future of work. It's a widespread workspace network leveraging underused urban spaces accessible through a single and flexible membership and allowing you to access a community of professionals to connect with.
